name: part_004
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Minato Aqua perform the song 'Lil' Bi'.
Transition screen announcing the next guest, Yuzuki Choco from Hololive 2nd Generation.
Introductory animation for Yuzuki Choco featuring syringes and chains.
Tokoyami Towa and Yuzuki Choco perform the song 'NoDistance'.
Transition screen announcing the next guest, Omaru Polka from Hololive 5th Generation.
Introductory animation for Omaru Polka with a cyber/grid theme.
Tokoyami Towa and Omaru Polka perform the song 'Ever Blue'.

subtitles.original: こっちらにお越しあそばせ
subtitles.english: Come over here, if you please

subtitles.original: その腕にひとまずネジ巻いて
subtitles.english: First, wind the spring on that arm

subtitles.original: なんてったってエヴリデイ ネジ巻いてネジ巻いてよ
subtitles.english: Because every day, wind it, wind it up

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね ちょっ、ちょっ、ちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little, just a, just a, just a little

subtitles.original: 拝め！ 夢を作る
subtitles.english: Worship! Creating a dream

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね ほんのちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little, just a tiny bit

subtitles.original: 盲目でもなんでもいいけど明日にちょっとだけ巻いて
subtitles.english: Being blind or anything is fine, but wind it a bit for tomorrow

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね ちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little, just a little

subtitles.original: こんな毎日も悪くないよ
subtitles.english: A daily life like this isn't bad either

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね ちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little, just a little

subtitles.original: でもちょっとだけじゃ そのうち 足りなくなるかも
subtitles.english: But just a little might not be enough soon

subtitles.original: リルビ リルビ リルビ...
subtitles.english: Lil' Bi, Lil' Bi, Lil' Bi...

subtitles.original: NoDistance\n退屈を並べては皆ふららイエイ
subtitles.english: NoDistance\nEveryone's drifting by, lining up their boredom, yeah

subtitles.original: 理屈だなんてゴミ箱へ
subtitles.english: Throw logic into the trash can

subtitles.original: 身に覚えあるんでしょ Answer
subtitles.english: You recognize this, don't you? Answer

subtitles.original: チクチク痛いのね
subtitles.english: It's a prickly pain, isn't it?

subtitles.original: リゴリズム踊らされて
subtitles.english: Dancing to rigorism

subtitles.original: 蝕まれてく アレ？ アレ？
subtitles.english: Being eroded, huh? Huh?

subtitles.original: 火に焼付けて 悪までも
subtitles.english: Sear it in fire, even if it's evil

subtitles.original: 癒してあげましょう
subtitles.english: I'll heal you

subtitles.original: ああ お目覚めですか
subtitles.english: Ah, are you awake?

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 響かせディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, let it ring, ding dong

subtitles.original: 笑えハッハと叫べ
subtitles.english: Laugh "ha ha" and shout

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 鳴らせよディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, ring it out, ding dong

subtitles.original: 病むのが先か 止むのがお先か
subtitles.english: Is falling ill first, or is it stopping ahead?

subtitles.original: 噛みつきはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't bite

subtitles.original: 慰めもしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't comfort you either

subtitles.original: 私のものね
subtitles.english: You're mine

subtitles.original: 飽きたらNoDistance
subtitles.english: When you're tired of it, NoDistance

subtitles.original: 闇間に溶け甘いチョコ溶かしてく
subtitles.english: Melting in the darkness, melting sweet chocolate

subtitles.original: 食べて崩し投げ捨ては説いてく
subtitles.english: Eating, breaking, throwing away and preaching

subtitles.original: 借り尽くし暴き出し瞳汚してく
subtitles.english: Borrowing all, exposing and soiling the eyes

subtitles.original: 傷が痛むのね
subtitles.english: The wound hurts, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: メカニズム踊らされて
subtitles.english: Dancing to the mechanism

subtitles.original: 蝕まれてく アレ？ アレ？
subtitles.english: Being eroded, huh? Huh?

subtitles.original: 間違えても正しくても
subtitles.english: Whether it's wrong or right

subtitles.original: 愛してあげましょう
subtitles.english: I'll love you

subtitles.original: ああ まだダメですか
subtitles.english: Ah, is it still no good?

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 狂わせディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, drive them mad, ding dong

subtitles.original: 最後にはッハと叫べ
subtitles.english: Shout "ha ha" at the end

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 迷わずディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, without hesitation, ding dong

subtitles.original: 冷める前に 口づけを
subtitles.english: Give me a kiss before it cools down

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 響かせディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, let it ring, ding dong

subtitles.original: 笑えハッハと叫べ
subtitles.english: Laugh "ha ha" and shout

subtitles.original: ディンドンディンドン 鳴らせよディンドン
subtitles.english: Ding dong, ding dong, ring it out, ding dong

subtitles.original: 病むのが先か 止むのがお先か
subtitles.english: Is falling ill first, or is it stopping ahead?

subtitles.original: 噛みつきはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't bite

subtitles.original: 慰めもしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't comfort you either

subtitles.original: 私のものね
subtitles.english: You're mine

subtitles.original: 飽きたらNoDistance
subtitles.english: When you're tired of it, NoDistance

subtitles.original: エヴァーブルー\n太陽が地平線に飲み込まれるのを
subtitles.english: Ever Blue\nWatching the sun being swallowed by the horizon

subtitles.original: 眺めていた
subtitles.english: I was watching it

subtitles.original: まぶたを閉じれば 私も消えてしまえるような
subtitles.english: As if I could disappear too if I closed my eyes

subtitles.original: 気がしたのに
subtitles.english: I felt that way

subtitles.original: 午前8時10時12分 生活の雑音を
subtitles.english: 8 AM, 10 AM, 12 PM, the noise of daily life

subtitles.original: バカになったふりして
subtitles.english: Pretending to have become stupid
